modifications: Added new useEffect for auto-focus logic
Introduced animationFrameRef for tracking animation frames

patterns_discovered: Using requestAnimationFrame for timing UI interactions
Cleaning up animation frames to prevent memory leaks
gotchas_discovered: Need to wait for dialog animations before focusing
Handling cases where no focusable elements exist

approach_outcome.description: Auto-focus first focusable element when dialog opens, with option to specify a custom initial focus element

recommendations: Use double requestAnimationFrame for more reliable animation timing
Always provide cleanup for animation frames
